intro:
Good morning! You just moved to Chicago to start your new career as a DevOps Specialist with DRW. 
Today's your first day in the office but you're not familiar with commute in the city!

Can make it to work ON TIME, or will you be LATE on your very first day?

Start New Game
Type 'Load' to load a saved game.
Quit

help:
Below is a list of available commands for this game:

GO ----> Move to a different location. USAGE: GO [Place]
GRAB --> Take an item and add to your inventory. USAGE: TAKE [Item]
TALK --> Initiate converation with an NPC. USAGE: TALK [Person]
PULL --> In the Bus Route, use PULL to stop the bus. USAGE: PULL Bellcord
BUY ---> In the Bus Route, use BUY to buy an item. USAGE: BUY [Item]
MAP ---> Display the game map and your current location. USAGE: MAP or SHOW MAP
TOGGLE SOUND -> Turn game sound on or off
VOLUME UP/DOWN --> Turn sound up/down by 10%
SFX VOLUME UP/DOWN --> Turn sfx volume up/down by 10%
HELP --> Display this help text.
QUIT --> Exit the game.
